text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Regulated Professions (Health and 

Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited regulated profession (health social care) (amendment) act 2020 (commencement) (no 2) order 2022

title: of the Regulated Professions (Health and Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020
heading: 2. The 1st day of June 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 139
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of June 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 139 
of the Regulated Professions (Health and Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 
(No. 16 of 2020) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 May, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st May, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [260] 3

title: of the Regulated Professions (Health and Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order appoints 1st June 2022 as the day on which section 139 of the 
Regulated Professions (Health and Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 
16 of 2020) shall come into operation. 

This provision amends the Medical Practitioners Act 2007. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [260]
